categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic divisions

nodes.text: The 132nd Forward Division was a military unit in the Alliance to Restore the Republic, which fought in the Galactic Civil War to overthrow the Galactic Empire and restore the Galactic Republic. Serving at some point following the Battle of Yavin, the division was stationed in the Outer Rim Territories' Atrivis sector. Among its officers was Major Belyssa Romey, a Human female.
The 132nd Forward Division was mentioned in the Star Wars Trilogy Sourcebook, Special Edition, published by West End Games in 1997.
